definition: Massive Ordinance Air Blast (MOAB), a powerful American bomb
pinyin: da4 xing2 kong1 bao4 zha4 dan4

definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to explode or burst/to quick fry or quick boil
to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)
